# PED::IS_PED_SITTING_IN_ANY_VEHICLE

## Summary
Checks the ped is sitting in any vehicle

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Detect if ped is in any vehicle
[True/False]
